summary: VEHICLE'S ENGINE SHUT OFF WHILE OPERATING, HOWEVER ELECTRICAL REMAINS ON. USUALLY HAPPENS GOING OVER SPEED BUMPS AT LOW SPEEDS. HAD TO TURN OFF AND RESTART ENGINE TO OPERATE. INCIDENT OCCURRED 2 TIMES IN 2009. DIDN'T GIVE MUCH THOUGHT UNTIL IT STARTED TO RECUR IN 2012. HAS HAPPENED 3-4 TIMES SINCE. ALSO KEY GETS STUCK WHEN TRYING TO SHUT VEHICLE OFF. THE KEY GETTING STUCK WHEN TRYING TO SHUT OFF HAS OCCURRED ALMOST DAILY FOR THE PAST 4 MONTHS. DIDN'T REALIZE THE INCIDENTS WERE RELATED UNTIL I HEARD ABOUT THE SATURN RECALL ON IGNITION SWITCHES AND HEARD ABOUT SIMILAR PROBLEMS.   *JS
